C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

command:
/bin/bash <<'EOF'
echo "Executing DB waits..."
until
  mysqladmin -uroot -h"${MARIADB_HOST}" -p"${MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD}" ping \
  && mysqladmin -uroot -h"${MARIADB_HOST}" -p"${MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD}" status;
  do sleep 2;
done
EOF
initContainers.name: release-name-gaseous-server-system-mariadb-wait
